title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the power Congress is exercising.

For Task A2, the response must explain why the framers of the Constitution gave Congress this power.

For Task B, the response must explain how Congress could respond to the actions recommended in the select committee’s final report.

For Task C1, the response must describe the constitutional principle that supports Nixon’s refusal to provide information to Congress.

For Task C2, the response must explain how The Federalist 70 supports Nixon’s actions.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
